name: plan_prd
description: Plan the PRD document structure before writing. Analyze the source content and create a structured plan for the document sections.

document_title.description: The title of the PRD document (e.g., 'Product Requirements Document: [Product Name]')

product_name.description: The name of the product or feature being documented

target_audience.description: Who this PRD is written for (e.g., 'Engineering team, Product stakeholders, Executive leadership')

sections.description: The sections to include in the PRD, in order

description.description: Brief description of what this section will cover

priority.description: How critical this section is for the PRD

planning_notes.description: Any notes about the approach, assumptions, or special considerations for this PRD
